Class DbCoordinators

  • public class DbCoordinators
extends DbAbstract
    The Class DbCoordinators for updating or retrieving information on the coordinators table.

    • Method Detail

      • insertCoordinator

        public static void insertCoordinator(CtCoordinator aCtCoordinator)
        Creates a new Coordinator in the database using the data from the CtCoordinator passed.
        Parameters:
        aCtCoordinator - The CtCoordinator of which to use the data of to create the row in the database

      • getCoordinator

        public static CtCoordinator getCoordinator(java.lang.String coordId)
        Gets a coordinator details from the database, depending on the ID used and creates a CtCoordinator class to house the data.
        Parameters:
        coordId - The ID of which Coordinator to get the data of
        Returns:
        The coordinator that holds the data retrieved. It could be an empty class!

      • deleteCoordinator

        public static void deleteCoordinator(CtCoordinator aCtCoordinator)
        Delete a coordinator from the database.
        Parameters:
        aCtCoordinator - The coordinator to delete from the database

      • updateCoordinator

        public static PtBoolean updateCoordinator(CtCoordinator aCtCoordinator)
        Updates a coordinator with the data passed. It uses the ID to update the details in the database
        Parameters:
        aCtCoordinator - The coordinator to update
        Returns:
        the pt boolean

      • getSystemCoordinators

        public static java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,CtCoordinator> getSystemCoordinators()
        Gets a list of all coordinators from the database. It's stored in a hashtable of the ID and the coordinator class
        Returns:
        Return a hashtable of coordinator ID's and their class
